name: interactive fully electrical vehicles
goal:
SME developing technology solutions for the production of highly specialized small electric vehicles.
Operates in a cluster of other SMEs to provide turn-key microfactories capable to produce small electric vehicles.
interests: Business and Industry, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Environment, Research and innovation, Transport
euInitiatives: European roadmaps related to electromobility, business models, climate change, manufacturing, blockchain and Artificial intelligence. Participation to related EU infodays.
